titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to clarify coverage of certified nurse-midwife services performed outside the maternity cycle under the medicaid programs.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6854-6855)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/28/1993--Introduced. Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to change the definition of certified nurse-midwife services (and thus allow certified nurse-midwives to receive payment under Medicaid for all services which such practitioners are legally authorized to perform under State law or regulations).
